abstract: Casting changes at the San Diego and Met opera houses will mean a new Siegfried in an upcoming production of "Gotterdammerung," and Ben Heppner playing Ahab in "Moby-Dick."
snippet: Casting changes at the San Diego and Met opera houses will mean a new Siegfried in an upcoming production of "Gotterdammerung," and Ben Heppner playing Ahab in "Moby-Dick."

headline.main: Opera Houses Play a Game of Tenor Round Robin
